Author: need2bskinnyplz
Text: As a former barista, I would clarify every single time but maybe the person on the register told the barista you wanted to classic after the rang you up?

Author: Aygurlitsyaalt
Text: A lot of the time if someone prints a sticker or writes wrong info we would verbally tell the people making the drink what the correction is. Its very likely that is actually what happened. If it had both classic and sf vanilla it would be CRAZY sweet and I think you could tell. Fret not!
